ARGUMENT
f

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isms.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` K ) |
| 2 |  | isms.x | |- X = ( Base ` K ) |
| 3 |  | isms.d | |- D = ( ( dist ` K ) |` ( X X. X ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( f = K -> ( dist ` f ) = ( dist ` K ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( f = K -> ( Base ` f ) = ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 6 | 5, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( f = K -> ( Base ` f ) = X ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_sqxpeqd | |- ( f = K -> ( ( Base ` f ) X. ( Base ` f ) ) = ( X X. X ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_reseq12d | |- ( f = K -> ( ( dist ` f ) |` ( ( Base ` f ) X. ( Base ` f ) ) ) = ( ( dist ` K ) |` ( X X. X ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 3 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( f = K -> ( ( dist ` f ) |` ( ( Base ` f ) X. ( Base ` f ) ) ) = D ) |
| 10 | 6 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( f = K -> ( Met ` ( Base ` f ) ) = ( Met ` X ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_eleq12d | |- ( f = K -> ( ( ( dist ` f ) |` ( ( Base ` f ) X. ( Base ` f ) ) ) e. ( Met ` ( Base ` f ) ) <-> D e. ( Met ` X ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_df-ms | |- MetSp = { f e. *MetSp | ( ( dist ` f ) |` ( ( Base ` f ) X. ( Base ` f ) ) ) e. ( Met ` ( Base ` f ) ) } |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( K e. MetSp <-> ( K e. *MetSp /\ D e. ( Met ` X ) ) ) |
